allow: Bash(powershell "Get-Process | Where-Object {$_ProcessName -like ''*python*'' -and $_CommandLine -like ''*main.py*''} | Select-Object Id, ProcessName, StartTime | Format-Table")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-WinEvent -FilterHashtable @{LogName=''Application''; ProviderName=''*Excel*''; StartTime=\(Get-Date\).AddDays\(-7\)} -MaxEvents 20 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Format-List TimeCreated, Id, Message")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Get-WinEvent -LogName Application -MaxEvents 50 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object { $_Message -match ''Excel'' -or $_ProviderName -match ''Excel'' -or $_ProviderName -match ''DCOM'' } | Select-Object TimeCreated, ProviderName, Id, Message | Format-List")
